data.actual_result: The emoji are cut off from the bottom.
data.expected_result: The emoji aren't cut off from the bottom.
data.short_description: When you set the font size to the maximum and type in colons the text field in a channel, the emoji that pop up in the autocomplete menu are cut from the bottom.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your font size to the maximum. - Open a channel you have permission to send messages in. - Type in a colon. - Observe the emoji in the autocomplete menu.
